ruleset.name: Apex Code Style Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code style and formatting

rule.name: MultipleStringContainsCalls
rule.message: Multiple String.contains() calls (at least {0}) in a conditional should be replaced with a single regex pattern for better performance and maintainability
rule.description: Multiple String.contains() calls in conditionals should be replaced with a single regex pattern for better performance and maintainability. This rule detects when there are a minimum number (configurable via minCalls property) or more contains() calls in a conditional expression.

property.name: minCalls
property.description: Minimum number of contains() calls required to trigger the rule
